verses.verse: Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> unto me, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> yet, love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8798><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> beloved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of her friend <S%H7453><s%>, yet an adulteress <S%H5003><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, according to the love <S%H160><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> toward the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, who look <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, and love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8802><s%> flagons <S%H809><s%> of wine <S%H6025><s%>.

So I bought <S%H3739><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her to me for fifteen <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2568><s%> pieces of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and for an homer <S%H2563><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%>, and an half homer <S%H3963><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%>:

And I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto her, Thou shalt abide <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for me many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; thou shalt not play the harlot <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and thou shalt not be <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for another man <S%H376><s%>: so will I also be for thee.

For the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall abide <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> without a king <S%H4428><s%>, and without a prince <S%H8269><s%>, and without a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>, and without an image <S%H4676><s%>, and without an ephod <S%H646><s%>, and without teraphim <S%H8655><s%>:

Afterward <S%H310><s%> shall the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and David <S%H1732><s%> their king <S%H4428><s%>; and shall fear <S%H6342><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> and his goodness <S%H2898><s%> in the latter <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.
